alert.note: Alert for Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 2:35PM MST until December 29 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected to commence by 8 pm mst this evening. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains and Catalina and Rincon Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio...commercial television or radio stations...or your cable television service provider for updates on this Winter Storm.

area.areaDesc: Galiuro and Pinaleno Mountains including Mount Graham; Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven
